resources.string: Provides information about the VPN connection state and serves as permanent notification to keep the VPN service running in the background.
Up to 1000Mb/s bandwidth to explore the world
Transfer obfuscate traffic via encrypted tunnel
Get unlimited bandwidth, speed and traffic
We will never store or share your access log
Have fun surfing without annoying ads!

1. Subscription will be charged to your credit card through your Google account at confirmation of purchase.

 2. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current valid period.

 3. To end a subscription, disable auto-renewal and allow the current period to end. It is not possible to cancel a subscription immediately.

 4. Refunds are not available for unused portions of a subscription.
Yearly subscription for 100 after trial ends
Will VPN slow down my system or Internet connection?
Why is my virtual IP detected to be from a different country than the one I choose?
VPN stands for Virtual Private Network. The main purpose of our VPN service is to ensure your security and privacy. To do this, VPN encrypts the traffic you transmit over the network.

VPN adds a new network interface which functions exactly as if you are working with a direct Internet connection. However, your IP address is now different, and all your traffic is encrypted.; VPN enables a host computer to send and receive data across shared or public networks as if they are an inegral part of a private network, with all the functionality, security and management policies that private networks provide.

We do NOT decrease the connection speed for any of our users. No matter you are a free user or have purchased a subscription - we will provide you the maximum possible connection speed for the current conditions. However, the conditions for your connection may vary because of the current workload on the selected VPN server and the distance from you to the selected VPN server.

Most of the geo-location services, like WhatIsMyIP and SpeedTest, update their IP databases rarely. That is why your virtual IP address can be detected as if it is located in a different country than the one you choose.

To change your Virtual

Location:

On the home screen tap on the current Virtual Location to see all Virtual Location options.

Tap a country to change the Virtual Locations.
Please Support Us by Give 5 Star Rating!

This app collects a limited amount of data to offer you a fast and reliable VPN service.
Examples of information we collect when you use this app:

Device-specific information like OS version, hardware model and IP address to optimize our network connection to you and ensure quality of service.

Aggregated, anonymized activity data, to perform analytics on our service, share insights about usage, and to ensure you can reliably access certain websites or apps.

Total bandwidth consumed and time connected to our VPN service.

Payment information and optional email, when you purchase a paid plan.

Full details about the data we collect and how we process it are available in our Privacy Policy
